== Bio ==
He has previously served as a security officer for the National
Supercomputer Centre, The Swedish National Infrastructure for Computing
and the Nordic DataGrid Facility, in addition to coordinating the
Incident Response Task Force for the European Grid Infrastructure.

Leif Nixon currently works at Red Hat (from March 1, 2015).

Affiliated with SUNET Cert.

Areas of expertise: Linux Security Incident Response.
